titles.title: Block Arms to Iran Act of 2015
A bill to limit the availability of funding for contributions to the United Nations if the arms embargo on Iran pursuant to United Nations Security Council Resolutions 1747 and 1929 is lifted.
Block Arms to Iran Act of 2015

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
Block Arms to Iran Act of 2015
This bill declares that, of the amounts appropriated or otherwise made available for the Department of State for "Contributions to International Organizations" and available for contributions to the United Nations, 20% may not be obligated or expended for that purpose if the arms embargo on Iran pursuant to Security Council Resolutions 1747 and 1929 is lifted, reduced, or otherwise eased.
